Message:
The Holy Night is when
you create fun memories
with someone you love.
A special time that
comes once a year.

Until now, I’ve been
living in hiding from
the Church of Longinus,

so I’ve never been able
to properly celebrate...

Everyone lives happily
here in Mister’s country,
whether they’re a witch or not,
so there’s no reason
to hide anymore.

Mister and Big Sis are here,
and even Theodora.

This year will be our
first Holy Night together.
I can hardly wait!

I’m gonna make up for
all the times I couldn’t
give you anything,
and give you the best
present ever, Big Sis.

Alright. Now that
my mind’s all set,
it’s time to hurry and
do some shopping!
